---
title: Command: km-package-list-installed
---
<!-- DO NOT MODIFY THIS FILE!  It was generated by help2md 1.48.4. -->

### Summary

List installed Keyman keyboard packages

### Syntax

```bash
km-package-list-installed [-h] [-l] [-s] [-o] [-u] [--version] [-v]

Neither sentry-sdk nor raven is available. Not enabling Sentry error reporting.
```

### Description


    [-vv]

Show installed Keyman keyboard packages with name, version, id.

### Parameters

`-h`, `--help`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;show this help message and exit

`-l`, `--long`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;long format also shows description

`-s`, `--shared`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;show those installed in shared area

`-o`, `--os`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;show those installed by the OS

`-u`, `--user`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;show those installed in user area

`--version`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;show program's version number and exit

`-v`, `--verbose`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;verbose logging

`-vv`, `--veryverbose`\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;__optional__\
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;very verbose logging
